con:request.name: SubmitPPIPayment
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="https://www.velocitypayment.com/ws" xmlns:ppi="http://www.ePayments.com/PPI" xmlns:ppip="http://www.ePayments.com/PPIPayment"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:SubmitPPIPayment> <!--Optional:--> <ws:token> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <ppi:UserName>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#AT_Username}</ppi:UserName> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Password>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#AT_Password}</ppi:Password><ppi:PPITransactionRequestId>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#AT_RequestID}</ppi:PPITransactionRequestId><ppi:PPIBusinessEntityIdentifierToken>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#AT_Identifier}</ppi:PPIBusinessEntityIdentifierToken> </ws:token> <!--Optional:--> <ws:payment Notes="${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#Notes}"> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:AdditionalInfo> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <ppi:Fees> <ppip:FeeType>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#FeeType}</ppip:FeeType> <ppip:Amount>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#FeeAmount}</ppip:Amount> </ppi:Fees> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
<!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <ppi:PaymentSegment> <ppip:Amount>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#SegmentAmount}</ppip:Amount><ppip:SegmentType>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#SegmentType}</ppip:SegmentType> <!--Optional:-->
</ppi:PaymentSegment> <!--Optional:-->
<ppi:PaymentType>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#PaymentType}</ppi:PaymentType><ppi:ProcessDate>${DataGenDateTest#TodayDate}</ppi:ProcessDate> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
</ppi:AdditionalInfo> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Customer> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<ppi:AddressLine1>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_AL1}</ppi:AddressLine1><ppi:AddressLine2>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_AL2}</ppi:AddressLine2><ppi:Country>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_Country}</ppi:Country><ppi:EmailAddress>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_Email}</ppi:EmailAddress><ppi:FirstName>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_FirstName}</ppi:FirstName><ppi:LastName>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_LastName}</ppi:LastName><ppi:MiddleInitial>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_MI}</ppi:MiddleInitial><ppi:Notes>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_Notest}</ppi:Notes><ppi:PhoneNumber>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_Phone}</ppi:PhoneNumber><ppi:Zip>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_ZIP}</ppi:Zip><ppi:Username>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_Username}</ppi:Username><ppi:Password>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_Password}</ppi:Password></ppi:Customer> <!--Optional:-->
<ppi:PreAuthorizeOnly>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_PreAuthOnly}</ppi:PreAuthorizeOnly> <ppi:ClientAccountNumber>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_CAN}</ppi:ClientAccountNumber><ppi:PaymentSource>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_PaymentSource}</ppi:PaymentSource> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Payor> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<ppi:AccountName>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_AccountName}</ppi:AccountName><ppi:AddressLine1>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_AL1}</ppi:AddressLine1><ppi:AddressLine2>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_AL2}</ppi:AddressLine2><ppi:Country>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_Country}</ppi:Country><ppi:PhoneNumber>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_Phone}</ppi:PhoneNumber><ppi:FirstName>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_FirstName}</ppi:FirstName><ppi:LastName>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_LastName}</ppi:LastName><ppi:MiddleInitial>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_MI}</ppi:MiddleInitial><ppi:EmailAddress>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_Email}</ppi:EmailAddress><ppi:ZipCode>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_ZIP}</ppi:ZipCode><ppi:BusinessName>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_BusinessName}</ppi:BusinessName><ppi:IsBusinessName>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_IsBusiness}</ppi:IsBusinessName> </ppi:Payor> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Vehicle> <!--Optional:-->
<ppip:AbaNumber>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_ABA}</ppip:AbaNumber><ppip:AccountType>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_AccountType}</ppip:AccountType> <!--Optional:-->
<ppip:CheckNumber>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_CheckNumber}</ppip:CheckNumber><ppip:CheckType>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_CheckType}</ppip:CheckType> <ppip:CheckNumberPosition>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_CheckPos}</ppip:CheckNumberPosition> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<ppip:CVV2Code>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_CVV}</ppip:CVV2Code><ppip:ExpirationDate>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_ExpDate}</ppip:ExpirationDate><ppip:PaymentVehicleNumber>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_VehicleNumber}</ppip:PaymentVehicleNumber><ppip:PaymentMethodCategory>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_PMCategory}</ppip:PaymentMethodCategory> <ppip:EnforcePinDebitValidation>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_EnforcePin}</ppip:EnforcePinDebitValidation> </ppi:Vehicle> </ws:payment> </ws:SubmitPPIPayment> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.script: def sdf = new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd") return sdf.format(new Date()) + "T08:59:00.000-04:00"
